headline.main: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol

lead_paragraph: Carlos Tevez marked his Chinese Super League (CSL) debut with a goal from the penalty spot as Shanghai Shenhua beat Jiangsu Suning 4-0 on Sunday while a brace from midfielder Paulinho sealed a winning start for champions Guangzhou Evergrande over Beijing Guoan.
